New Drone’s Military-Grade Tech Makes It A Must-Have

And even complete beginners can fly it!

A brand-new gadget is fast becoming the most talked about and sought-after product in the country. Using technology that was until recently only available to the military, this easy-to-use drone is soaring above its rivals all over the UK.

Drone experts and complete beginners have been bowled over by its crystal clear aerial photography, easy learning curve, and advanced safety features. And even better, it’s one of the most affordable drones on the market – especially now that it’s on sale for 50% off.

Introducing QuadronX

This fantastic new drone is called QuadronX, and it’s a game-changer! The US and British militaries have perfected drone technology in the last few years. Drones are now more stable, easier to fly, and can take much better (spy-grade!) pictures. But until only last year, most of this futuristic tech was kept strictly under wraps.

Now though, this technology has finally been declassified. And a team of top engineers has stolen a march on their competitors by applying these innovations to their latest creation – QuadronX.

An Advanced Drone Built For Beginners

The appeal of QuadronX is that, even though it uses cutting-edge technology, it’s incredibly easy to use. If you’ve never flown a drone, you might imagine it’s fiddly and tricky. And you’re right — most drones have a steep learning curve.

Not so QuadronX. Although it boasts advanced, military-grade tech, most is hidden “under the hood”. Controlling the drone is a breeze. Ever operated a remote control car? Then you’re fully qualified to fly QuadronX!

Professional-Level Photography

Despite being easy to master, QuadronX’s tech packs a serious punch. And that’s especially true of the high-definition videos and photos it takes from the air. With its 1080p HD camera, you can make out every single razor-sharp detail of your pics. including stunning panoramic, 360-degree images.

There’s nothing more satisfying than effortlessly flying your QuadronX, then checking out the unique, breathtaking images it’s captured for you. They’re so good you won’t be able to resist sharing them. Post them on FB or Insta, then watch the likes and reposts come rolling in!

Feeling creative? QuadronX comes with an in-app special effects feature you can apply to your images to make them look even cooler. Plus, the drone has hand-signal recognition capability. That means it can help you take the perfect selfie with a wave of your hand.

Here’s what we love about QuadronX

1. It’s great for beginners

Even if you’ve never flown a drone before, QuadronX is incredibly easy to master. Using the professional remote control, you’ll soon pick up how to control your drone so it does exactly what you want it to. And if you prefer, you can fly it using a phone app. Even your grandma could fly QuadronX!

2. It helps you fly better

The QuadronX controller includes special ‘flight assistance’ buttons to help you fly the drone. With one press of a button, you can make it perform a headless rollover. There’s another button that brings the drone right back to you, as well as one that tells the drone to execute a safe emergency landing.

3. It captures flawless videos and pictures

Taking breathtaking aerial photos and vids is one of the most thrilling aspects of owning a drone. QuadronX comes equipped with a 1080p HD camera that can take footage at 360 degrees. WiFi Real-Time FPV means you can see exactly what the drone sees. The image quality is crystal clear, so your friends and family will be awestruck by the images you take.

4. It’s safe and very child-friendly

Want to give your kids a turn but worried they’ll crash your brand-new drone? Don’t be! QuadronX is one of the most stable drones on the market, so it won’t wobble or bobble about during flight! Blade protectors ensure that even if you hit an obstacle, the blades aren’t damaged, and your drone will stay airborne.

5. It’s compact and lightweight

Looking for a lightweight but sturdy drone you can carry around with you? QuadronX is the Mini of the drone world – small but perfectly formed! It folds right down, meaning you can take it with you on all your adventures.

6. It’s great value for money

Despite boasting military-grade tech, QuadronX is surprisingly affordable. Considering its quality, clever design features, and durability, you won’t find a better-value drone currently available. Add in the huge discounts currently on offer, and QuadronX is a fantastic bargain.

QuadronX Is Selling Out Fast!

As the days get longer and the weather brightens, you’ll see more and more QuadronX drones soaring through the skies. They’re already selling fast. And given the time and care that goes into manufacturing them, stocks are extremely limited.

The good news is that – for now – there are still some units of QuadronX available. And even better, for a short time only, they’re discounted to half price!

This sale will NOT last long; once it’s over, it may be some time until you can get your hands on QuadronX again. Our advice? Buy now so you don’t end up waiting too long and missing out.
